title: Modi 240 wants to shut down @MrBeast... and @dhruvrathee | Broadcasting Bill EXPLAINED!
selftext: Under the v2/revised broadcasting bill. Anyone can be considered as broadcaster
comments:
as a subscriber and a frequent visitor of Megnerd, I have to say its a great all round discussion on varied topics that brings me back to them....

Strongly recommend watching them if you can sit through hour long videos.

Someone just read Orwell and liked it a little too much! Just saw the video, writing comments on reddit or sending messages on whatsapp would also come into the purview of this bill if I am not wrong. 

Does the SC have the power to strike this down as unconstitutional?
But, the governent can't built their own wall, they are asking us to self-censor, or else...
